page.title: 07Farming cont,
page.content: {Livestock }includes one large dairy herd with 200 cows one large pig unit with 200 sow,the rest is more conventionl with hereford cross cattle being fattened on the best pastures and cross breed sheep on the hills. { Employment} is mainly agriculture and allied industries,includes poultry breeding and hatching,there is aisop industrial factories on the old arodrome.The farm worker of today needs to be more technically minded and farm wages are now on par with local industry. {Unemployment}is below the national average,most peiple from the tiwns buying coyyages to retire to the country. {Labour relations }are on the whole very good, as most employers only employ a small workforce.
